core / StateAndRef

StateAndRef

data class StateAndRef<out T : ContractState>

A StateAndRef is simply a (state, ref) pair. For instance, a wallet (which holds available assets) contains these.



Constructors

A StateAndRef is simply a (state, ref) pair. For instance, a wallet (which holds available assets) contains these.
